name: CryptoSensei
description: A plugin to get cryptocurrency information, including prices, historical data, news, social media stats, and more.

endpoints.name: get_crypto_price
endpoints.description: Get the current price of a cryptocurrency.

endpoints.name: get_historical_daily_data
endpoints.description: Get historical daily data for a cryptocurrency.

endpoints.name: get_historical_hourly_data
endpoints.description: Get historical hourly data for a cryptocurrency.

endpoints.name: get_historical_minute_data
endpoints.description: Get historical minute data for a cryptocurrency.

endpoints.name: get_crypto_news
endpoints.description: Get the latest news about cryptocurrencies.

endpoints.name: get_top_cryptos
endpoints.description: Get a list of the top 10 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization.

endpoints.name: get_social_media_stats
endpoints.description: Get social media statistics for a cryptocurrency.

endpoints.name: get_average_price
endpoints.description: Get the average price of a cryptocurrency.
